name: easter chick
notes:
**skill level**
beginner. if you need any help, check out [www.thewoobles.com][1] for tutorials, or reach out to [hello@thewoobles.com][2]!

**completely new to amigurumi?**
buy a chick crochet kit from [my etsy shop][3], or directly from [my website][4]. it includes an in-depth tutorial on how to get started with crochet, and comes with all the materials you need. after going through the kit, you’ll be on your way to being able to make all the woobles patterns!

**materials**
* 25 yds of yellow acrylic aran-weight yarn 
* 1 yds of orange acrylic aran-weight yarn
* 2 8mm plastic safety eyes 
* polyfill
* tapestry needle
* stitch marker
* 4mm crochet hook

**size**
3 in (7.6 cm) tall

**language**
english with us terminology
